title: Rank gaps
body: Obviously this has been answered many times before but I can't seem to find any place that has the answer I am looking for. So I was wondering can a gold player start a lobby and invite a plat but also invites a silver player? Plat < - Gold - > Silver?

replies.body:
you can invite them, but only one of them will be able to accept, as once one of them is in the gap between the silver and plat is too large.

the fact there is a gold player in there is irrelevant apart from being able to invite a plat player
You can't. If you're gold you have to queue with one or the other, not both at the same time as they can't queue with each other.
Thanks everyone, I have found the answer I need!
